intro: If you know the Sunday school song about Zacchaeus, you might want to sing it to yourself... It'll probably help you answer some of these questions!

questions.ask: What physical characteristic initially hindered Zacchaeus from seeing Jesus?
What was Zacchaeus's line of work?
What derogatory name did the crowd call Zacchaeus when Jesus visited his home?
What town was home to Zacchaeus?
How much did Zacchaeus promise to pay back to anyone had cheated?

intro: Like Michael or Jason today, Zechariah was a very popular name in Bible times. Your job in this quiz is to sort out which Zechariah is which?

questions.ask: What famed evangelist was born to a priest named Zechariah?
At what place of worship was Zechariah, the son of the high priest Jehoiada, stoned to death for condemning Judah's idolatry?
What violent act ended the reign of the evil King Zechariah of Israel only six months after he took power?
What structure in Jerusalem did a certain Zechariah, son of Jonathan, help Nehemiah dedicate?
What type of tree surrounded a man on a red horse in a vision of the prophet Zechariah?

intro: Well, what better clue can we give you than that? Every answer in this quiz will include a Z somewhere inside

questions.ask: What town in Galilee was the boyhood home of Jesus?
What word described the crowd's response when Jesus used His authority to drive out evil spirits?
What Philistine city's name is still heard in the news today, often with the word "strip"?
What "prince of demons" did Pharisees accuse Jesus of using to cast out demons?
What town, along with Bethsaida, did not repent when Jesus performed miracles there and thus received a pronouncement of woe?

intro: A classic hymn says that "glorious things of thee are spoken, Zion, city of our God." What do you know about this important place?

questions.ask: What great king of Israel captured the fortress of Zion from mocking Jebusites?
What happy musical compositions of Zion did the psalmist remember longingly "by the rivers of Babylon"?
What important religious artifact was brought from Zion to the new temple built by Solomon?
What kind of stone, according to the apostle Paul, did God lay in Zion?
How many of those "redeemed from the earth" stood with the Lamb on Mount Zion in John's Revelation?
